3.name: Peddler
3.text: "Oh, Lady Sol! I'm glad to see you!"

4.name: Sol
4.text: "Oh, hello! You seem to be doing well!!"

5.name: Peddler
5.text:
"Yes, thanks to you. By the way... Lady Sol, I
have a favor to ask of you..."

7.name: Erick
7.text:
"......As always, you seem energetic, Sol-
chan......"

11.name: Peddler
11.text:
"I want to go peddling to the village beyond the
mountain, but there are no guards passing by at
the moment."

12.name: Peddler
12.text:
"I know it's quite rude to make such a request...
but would you please accompany me to the village,
Lady Sol?"

13.name: Erick
13.text:
"Hmm, so it's about being a guard. Indeed, right
now, the adventurers who could help out seem to be
away..."

15.name: Erick
15.text:
"Sol-chan, at least show a little sign of thinking
it over."

16.name: Peddler
16.text:
"Oh, thank you very much...!! Please let me know
when you are ready..."

21.text: Scene: Mountain Dungeon - Encounter with Kobolds

27.name: Adventurer
27.text:
"...What's this? They seem to be prostrating
themselves."

29.name: Erick
29.text:
"They don't seem hostile, but... are they trying
to communicate something...?"

31.name: Sol
31.text:
"They're saying, 'Please help us, Dragon-sama!' in
the language of dragons!"

34.name: Erick
34.text: "Don't pout just because it's a joke."

38.name: Sol
38.text:
"The kobolds were living in these caves in the
mountains."

39.name: Sol
39.text:
"However, recently, a bad 'manticoa' has settled
in and is causing trouble for the kobolds."

40.name: Sol
40.text:
"It seems they're saying, 'At this rate, this
mountain will become theirs. Please, help us!'!"

43.name: Adventurer
43.text:
"A wicked magical beast with a human face and a
beast's body, huh. Well, I can't just leave it
be... If this mountain path is destroyed, the
village ahead will be in trouble too."

44.name: Sol
44.text:
"Understood!! First, let's escort the traveling
merchant to the village, and then prepare to
exterminate the manticore!!"

45.name: Erick
45.text:
"If we don't go through the Adventurer's Guild to
make it an official request, we might miss out on
our reward... you know!"
